title: 10/13 Fantasy Football Podcast: Start or Sit (NFC), Dallas RBs
description:
So, Alfred Morris or Darren McFadden? Find out who Dave and Jamey are recommending and who to drop for these guys (2:00), then we recap PHI-CAR (7:30) and compare the QBs rest of season. And will we see more carries for Christian McCaffrey going forward? ... "Beat the Waiver Wire" for Week 7 (22:10) and some Week 6 bold predictions (25:21). Good sleepers are available! ... TB-ARI (28:50), DET-NO (37:13), GB-MIN (45:21), SF-WAS (51:00), MIA-ATL (56:50), NYG-DEN (1:01:00) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
